title: Weapons Validation - Destroyers
red_mission_summary: RED destroyers are conducting weapons validation exercises. Test torpedo and depth charge capabilities against simulated submarine threats.
blue_mission_summary: BLUE submarine is participating in weapons validation exercises. RED destroyers will test their ASW capabilities.
objective: Validate destroyer weapons systems and submarine evasion capabilities.
blue_captain_summary: Weapons validation exercise. RED destroyers will test torpedo and depth charge systems. Practice evasion and counter-detection techniques.
roe: Weapons release authorized for validation purposes.

ship_behaviors.red-dd-torp-01: You are a destroyer conducting torpedo validation exercises. When you detect the submarine, fire torpedoes at the contact bearing. Use realistic engagement parameters: run depth 100-200m, enable range 1000-3000m. Test both single and salvo firing.
ship_behaviors.red-dd-torp-02: You are a destroyer conducting torpedo validation exercises. When you detect the submarine, fire torpedoes at the contact bearing. Use realistic engagement parameters: run depth 100-200m, enable range 1000-3000m. Test both single and salvo firing.
ship_behaviors.red-dd-dc-01: You are a destroyer conducting depth charge validation exercises. When you detect the submarine, close to within 1 km and drop depth charge spreads. Use realistic parameters: spread 20-50m, depths 20-100m, multiple charges per spread.
ship_behaviors.red-dd-dc-02: You are a destroyer conducting depth charge validation exercises. When you detect the submarine, close to within 1 km and drop depth charge spreads. Use realistic parameters: spread 20-50m, depths 20-100m, multiple charges per spread.

triggers.comms: INFO: Weapons validation commencing. Expect torpedo salvos and depth charge spreads.
INFO: Torpedo units cleared to fire pairs at suspected bearings.
INFO: Depth charge units cleared to drop multiple spreads when within 1 km.
